post:
Webhosting.uk.com is offering VPS hosting plans in the most affordable prices. These virtual private servers are no less in comparison to the dedicated servers in terms of speed and performance. The Linux VPS hosting platform is powered by Virtuozzo technology and they are established on Powerful Dual Quad Core Xeon servers that ensure optimum performance and better flexibility. Whereas the Windows VPS is powered by Hyper-V that ensures complete efficiency and uptime of the website. Both the Linux and Windows VPS hosting platforms are equally efficient for managing large websites and installing third party applications.

The VPS hosting platform provided by Webhosting.uk.com is the perfect for getting complete control over your hosting environment. The Linux based VPS hosting platforms are based on the XEN virtualization technology that ensures optimum performance of the servers.24/7 pro-active support and monitoring is offered in order to ensure the uptime and speed of your website. Loaded with the latest technology and enriched with industry leading features; these virtual private servers are a complete value for money.
